execution_plan.description: Retrieve all customers with their gender codes from the users database.
Retrieve all order items with their associated customer_id by joining Order_Items to Orders, but only for customers returned in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT oi.order_item_id, oi.product_id, oi.order_id, o.customer_id FROM Order_Items oi JOIN Orders o ON oi.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.customer_id IN ($step1.customer_id);
